Introduction

Lim Se-jun is the lead vocalist, visual, face of the boy group Victon under Play M Entertainment. Aside from singing, Sejun loves everything about fashion and e-sports.

Sejun debuted as a member of VICTON on November 9, 2016 with the mini album, 'Voice To New World.'

On February 19, 2025 From20 and Hello Gloom announced him as their newest artist to the Way Better label!
